alert.note: Alert for Kane (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued August 03 at 5:26PM MDT until August 03 at 6:45PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 645 PM MDT THIS EVENING FOR SOUTHERN KANE COUNTY... At 526 PM MDT, Radar estimates of between 0.5 and 1 inch of rain fell over the Buckskin Wash watershed, including Wire Pass and The Wave, from earlier thunderstorms. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of slot canyons and normally dry washes Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Buckskin Gulch, Wire Pass, and The Wave FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Remain alert for flooding even in locations not receiving rain. Dry washes, and slot canyons can become raging killer currents in a matter of minutes, even from distant rainfall.
